19094973.admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The project would assist in financing
            the improvement and construction of four national primary
            highways, the preparation of feasibility studies and
            engineering for additional highway sections and the services
            of consulting engineers.
